text: @SelectGOP @SteveScalise How is it that the GOP believes in owing it to the people who died to get to the bottom of this but simultanously support a President and Party who doesn't care about the over 100k+ dead Americans from COVID19(which they frequently call a hoax or Democrat lie)?
